trans-unit.source: Provides a method that when implemented, resolves a latitude/longitude location to a civic address.
trans-unit.target: 提供方法，以便在實作時將緯度/經度位置解析成實體地址。

trans-unit.source: To resolve a <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate> to a <xref:System.Device.Location.CivicAddress> asynchronously, implement <xref:System.Device.Location.ICivicAddressResolver.ResolveAddressAsync%2A>, and provide the civic address data to the <xref:System.Device.Location.ICivicAddressResolver.ResolveAddressCompleted> event.
trans-unit.target: 若要解決<xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate>至<xref:System.Device.Location.CivicAddress>以非同步方式實作<xref:System.Device.Location.ICivicAddressResolver.ResolveAddressAsync%2A>，並提供民事位址資料給<xref:System.Device.Location.ICivicAddressResolver.ResolveAddressCompleted>事件。

trans-unit.source: The latitude/longitude location to resolve to an address.
trans-unit.target: 要解析成地址的緯度/經度位置。

trans-unit.source: Resolves a <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate" /> to a civic address synchronously.
trans-unit.target: 將 <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate" /> 同步解析成實體地址。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to call <xref:System.Device.Location.ICivicAddressResolver.ResolveAddress%2A>.
The latitude/longitude location to resolve to an address.
trans-unit.target: 要解析成地址的緯度/經度位置。

trans-unit.source: Initiates a request to resolve a latitude/longitude location to an address.
trans-unit.target: 初始化將緯度/經度位置解析成地址的要求。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to call <xref:System.Device.Location.ICivicAddressResolver.ResolveAddressAsync%2A>.

Occurs when an asynchronous request using <see cref="M:System.Device.Location.ICivicAddressResolver.ResolveAddressAsync(System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate)" /> to resolve a latitude/longitude to a civic address is complete.
trans-unit.target: 發生於利用 <see cref="M:System.Device.Location.ICivicAddressResolver.ResolveAddressAsync(System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate)" /> 將緯度/經度解析成實體地址的非同步要求完成時。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to call <xref:System.Device.Location.ICivicAddressResolver.ResolveAddressAsync%2A> and handle the <xref:System.Device.Location.ICivicAddressResolver.ResolveAddressCompleted> event.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何呼叫<xref:System.Device.Location.ICivicAddressResolver.ResolveAddressAsync%2A>及處理<xref:System.Device.Location.ICivicAddressResolver.ResolveAddressCompleted>事件。
